name: Karting Grand Prix Minigame
description:
This game was created with Unity on the basis of the Unity project "Karting Microgame".

Karting Grand Prix of Minigame is a 3D kart racing game where you can have fun and you will have to overcome mini-games

- 3 types of mini-games (Pass the Checkpoint, knock down the pins, complete the laps)

- You can play with the keyboard and with the joystick.

JOYSTICK BUTTONS

Movement: Analog of the controller
Pause / Options: xbox "back" button

NOTE: Do not use the Steam overlay unless you first pause the game.

GOOD FUN !!!
